scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && mkdir -p dist/prisma && cp prisma/schema.prisma dist/prisma/ && cp -R prisma/migrations dist/prisma/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd dist && PRISMA_SCHEMA_PATH=./prisma/schema.prisma npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.render:build: npm install && npm run build && cd dist && npm install --production && npx prisma generate
